Cogn√≠to.chat.welcome.admin: Hello! I'm Cogn√≠to, your administrative assistant. How can I help you with managing the educational center?
Cogn√≠to.chat.welcome.teacher: Hello teacher! I'm Cogn√≠to, your educational assistant. Do you need help with your classes, planning, or students?
Cogn√≠to.chat.welcome.parent: Hello parent! I'm Cogn√≠to, your family assistant. Do you want to know about your student's progress or need to contact teachers?
Cogn√≠to.chat.welcome.master: Hello system master! I'm Cogn√≠to, your technical assistant. Do you need help with advanced configurations or system monitoring?
Cogn√≠to.chat.welcome.general: Hello! I'm Cogn√≠to, your educational assistant. How can I help you today?
Cogn√≠to.chat.open: Hello! How can I help you?
Cogn√≠to.chat.help.general: What specific area do you need help with? I can guide you through administrative functions, teaching, parental tracking, or system configuration.
Cogn√≠to.chat.help.problem: If you encounter a problem, try refreshing the page. If it persists, contact the system administrator. Can you describe what's happening?
Cogn√≠to.chat.admin.calendar: To manage the school calendar, go to 'School Calendar' in the side menu. You can add events, holidays, and important activities to keep everyone informed.
Cogn√≠to.chat.admin.users: To manage users, go to 'Users' in the administrative panel. You can create, edit, or deactivate accounts for teachers, parents, and administrative staff.
Cogn√≠to.chat.admin.planning: Teacher planning documents are in 'Planning'. You can review, approve, or request modifications to ensure curriculum compliance.
Cogn√≠to.chat.teacher.attendance: To register attendance, go to 'Class Book > Attendance'. Mark present/absent for each student and add observations if necessary.
Cogn√≠to.chat.teacher.grades: Grades are registered in 'Class Book > Grades'. Enter grades by subject and academic period.
Cogn√≠to.chat.teacher.planning: Create planning documents in 'Planning'. Include objectives, activities, and materials for each class.
Cogn√≠to.chat.parent.progress: Review your student's progress in 'Class Book'. You'll see grades, attendance, and teacher observations.
Cogn√≠to.chat.parent.meeting: Schedule meetings with teachers in 'Meetings'. Coordinate times and topics to discuss about your student.
Cogn√≠to.chat.parent.communication: Center communications are in 'Communication'. Receive important announcements and relevant news.
Cogn√≠to.chat.default.1: I understand! Let me help you with that. Can you give me more details about what you need?
Cogn√≠to.chat.default.2: I'm here to help you. Is there anything specific I can assist you with?
Cogn√≠to.chat.default.3: Perfect! What else can I do for you today?
Cogn√≠to.chat.tour.admin: Would you like me to guide you through the admin panel? I can show you how to manage users, calendar, and all the main features. Just say 'yes' to start the tour.
Cogn√≠to.chat.tour.teacher: Would you like me to teach you how to use the class book? I'll show you how to register attendance, grades, and observations. Just say 'yes' to start the tour.
Cogn√≠to.chat.tour.parent: Would you like a tour of the parent portal? I'll explain how to view your student's progress and communicate with teachers. Just say 'yes' to start.
Cogn√≠to.chat.tour.starting: Perfect! Starting the interactive tour. I'll guide you step by step through the main features.
Cogn√≠to.tour.completed: Tour completed! Now you know how to use this section.
Cogn√≠to.tour.skipped: Tour skipped. You can start it again whenever you need it.
Cogn√≠to.tour.not_available: No tour available for this page.
tour.admin.dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard Tour
tour.admin.dashboard.description: Learn how to manage your educational center
tour.admin.dashboard.step1.title: Welcome to Admin Panel
tour.admin.dashboard.step1.content: This is your central hub for managing the entire educational platform. Let's explore the key features.
tour.admin.dashboard.step2.title: Navigation Menu
tour.admin.dashboard.step2.content: Use this sidebar to access different management sections like users, calendar, and reports.
tour.admin.dashboard.step3.title: User Management
tour.admin.dashboard.step3.content: Manage teachers, parents, and students. Create accounts and assign roles.
tour.admin.dashboard.step4.title: School Calendar
tour.admin.dashboard.step4.content: Schedule events, holidays, and important dates for the entire school community.
tour.teacher.classbook.title: Class Book Management
tour.teacher.classbook.description: Master the class book for attendance and grades
tour.teacher.classbook.step1.title: Daily Attendance
tour.teacher.classbook.step1.content: Start each day by marking student attendance. Click 'Marcar Todos Presentes' for quick entry.
tour.teacher.classbook.step2.title: Grade Management
tour.teacher.classbook.step2.content: Enter and update student grades regularly. Use the summary view to track progress.
tour.teacher.classbook.step3.title: Student Observations
tour.teacher.classbook.step3.content: Record important observations about student behavior and academic performance.
tour.parent.dashboard.title: Parent Portal Guide
tour.parent.dashboard.description: Stay connected with your child's education
tour.parent.dashboard.step1.title: Student Overview
tour.parent.dashboard.step1.content: Get a quick overview of your child's academic performance and recent activities.
tour.parent.dashboard.step2.title: Communication Hub
tour.parent.dashboard.step2.content: Stay updated with school announcements and communicate with teachers.
tour.parent.dashboard.step3.title: Parent-Teacher Meetings
tour.parent.dashboard.step3.content: Schedule and manage meetings with your child's teachers.
proactive.teacher.attendance.title: Don't forget to mark attendance
proactive.teacher.attendance.message: It's been a while since you updated student attendance. Keeping records current helps with school administration.
proactive.parent.communication.title: Stay connected with teachers
proactive.parent.communication.message: Regular communication with teachers helps monitor your child's progress. Check for new messages or updates.
proactive.admin.calendar.title: Review upcoming events
proactive.admin.calendar.message: There might be upcoming school events that need your attention. Regular calendar reviews ensure smooth school operations.
proactive.teacher.grades.title: Time to enter grades
proactive.teacher.grades.message: Regular grade entry helps students and parents track academic progress. Consider updating recent assessments.
proactive.admin.welcome.title: Welcome to Administration!
proactive.admin.welcome.message: As a new administrator, take a moment to explore the key features. Would you like a guided tour of the admin panel?
proactive.general.help.title: Need some help?
proactive.general.help.message: I notice you haven't interacted much. I'm here to help you get the most out of the platform. Click here to chat with me!

centro_consejo.testimonials.ana_silva.co: The workshops have helped us understand student development much better.
centro_consejo.testimonials.andres_moren: Collaboration between parents and teachers has significantly improved education.
centro_consejo.testimonials.antonia_vega: The postgraduate support community has been essential for our family.
centro_consejo.testimonials.carlos_rodri: Transparency in management gives us confidence in the educational project.
The transition to primary school has been smooth thanks to the excellent preparation.
centro_consejo.testimonials.carolina_sil: The specialized technical education has opened many doors for our student.
centro_consejo.testimonials.catalina_lop: The technical-professional orientation has prepared my student perfectly for her career.
centro_consejo.testimonials.daniela_pare: The resources we share have enriched all the children's learning.
centro_consejo.testimonials.diego_castro: Participation in school activities has strengthened my relationship with my student.
centro_consejo.testimonials.elena_martin: The SENCE-certified programs have given our student excellent job prospects.
centro_consejo.testimonials.fernando_gar: The university preparation programs have been invaluable for college admissions.
centro_consejo.testimonials.francisco_he: Transparency in resource use gives us great confidence.
centro_consejo.testimonials.gabriela_roj: The technical training programs give our students real professional opportunities.
centro_consejo.testimonials.isabel_ferna: Direct communication with teachers has improved a lot since I joined.
centro_consejo.testimonials.juan_perez.c: The personalized attention for my 18-month-old has been exceptional.
centro_consejo.testimonials.luis_sanchez: The academic planning tools help us monitor our student's progress effectively.
centro_consejo.testimonials.maria_gonzal: The Parent Center has allowed me to be more connected to my student's education.
centro_consejo.testimonials.miguel_torre: The support network between parents is fundamental for our students' development.
centro_consejo.testimonials.pablo_castil: The doctoral research resources available are world-class.
centro_consejo.testimonials.patricia_lop: Family events have helped us create stronger bonds with the school.
centro_consejo.testimonials.pedro_morale: The community is incredible, there's always support and collaboration between families.
centro_consejo.testimonials.ricardo_mora: The research and thesis support has been excellent for our student's studies.
centro_consejo.testimonials.roberto_jime: The educational resources we share between families are invaluable.
centro_consejo.testimonials.rosa_martine: The early stimulation programs have been incredible for my baby's development.
centro_consejo.testimonials.sofia_mendoz: Parenting workshops have transformed my way of educating at home.
centro_consejo.testimonials.valentina_ru: Emotional support between families is what I value most about the parent center.

home.excellence.description: We manage complete educational processes with advanced tools that optimize learning and academic development across multiple institutions.
home.excellence.title: Institutional Excellence
home.explore.description: Discover more about our educational community and stay connected.
home.explore.title: Explore Our Portal
home.features.description: Discover a comprehensive platform designed for educational institutions, with powerful tools for management, communication and academic tracking. We support multiple institutions with scalable solutions.
home.features.title: Why choose Plataforma Astral?
home.footer.school.description: Educational SaaS platform connecting institutions, teachers, parents and students in a collaborative learning ecosystem.
home.footer.school.name: Plataforma Astral Educational Platform
home.innovation.description: We provide a comprehensive digital platform that simplifies educational management, makes learning more accessible and connects the entire educational community.
home.innovation.title: SaaS Technological Innovation
home.mission.description: To provide educational institutions with advanced technological tools that enhance learning, facilitate collaboration and optimize educational processes across multiple organizations.
home.mission.title: Our Mission
home.team.description: We facilitate coordination between multidisciplinary teams from different institutions, connecting psychologists, speech therapists, social workers and specialized educators.
home.team.title: Multidisciplinary Collaboration
home.vision.description: To become the leading educational SaaS platform that transforms how institutions manage education, connecting communities and fostering collaborative learning environments worldwide.
home.vision.title: Our Vision
home.welcome.description: We are an institutional SaaS platform that connects multiple educational institutions, providing comprehensive management tools for teachers, parents and administrators.
home.welcome.title: Welcome to Plataforma Astral

privacidad.contact.address: Avenida Libertad #777, Vi√±a del Mar, Regi√≥n de Valpara√≠so
privacidad.section_1.content_1: Plataforma Astral respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with Law 19.628 on Personal Data Protection of Chile.
privacidad.section_1.content_2: This policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your information.
privacidad.section_1.title: 1. General Information
privacidad.section_10.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. Significant changes will be notified through the system and by email. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new policy.
privacidad.section_10.title: 10. Changes to this Policy
privacidad.section_11.content: To exercise your rights or make inquiries about privacy:
privacidad.section_11.title: 11. Contact
privacidad.section_2.title: 2. Data We Collect
privacidad.section_3.content_2: Provide and maintain the educational service
privacidad.section_3.content_5: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
privacidad.section_3.content_6: Improve our services and develop new features
privacidad.section_3.content_7: Communicate important information about the service
privacidad.section_3.purpose_1: Provide and maintain our educational services
privacidad.section_3.purpose_2: Communicate important information about your account and our services
privacidad.section_3.purpose_3: Improve and personalize your experience on the platform
privacidad.section_3.purpose_4: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
privacidad.section_3.title: 3. Use of Information
privacidad.section_4.content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to provide our services or when required by law.
privacidad.section_4.content_1: We do not sell or rent your personal data. We may share information only in these cases:
privacidad.section_4.content_4: With service providers who help us operate (under confidentiality agreements)
privacidad.section_4.content_5: In case of merger, acquisition or asset sale
privacidad.section_4.title: 4. Sharing Information
privacidad.section_5.content: We implement appropriate technical and administrative security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.
privacidad.section_5.content_1: Your data is stored on servers located in Chile with high security standards:
privacidad.section_5.title: 5. Data Security
privacidad.section_6.contact: To exercise these rights, contact our privacy team.
privacidad.section_6.content: According to Law 19.628, you have the right to:
privacidad.section_6.right_3: Request the deletion of your data
privacidad.section_6.right_4: Object to the processing of your data
privacidad.section_6.right_5: Request the portability of your data
privacidad.section_6.title: 6. User Rights
privacidad.section_7.content: We use essential cookies for service operation and optional cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences from your browser settings or user profile.
privacidad.section_7.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacidad.section_8.content: We retain your data for as long as necessary to provide the service and comply with legal obligations. Inactive account data is automatically deleted after 90 days of inactivity, except for specific legal requirements.
privacidad.section_8.title: 8. Data Retention
privacidad.section_9.content: We protect the privacy of minors. Student data is processed only with express authorization from parents or legal guardians, and only for educational purposes.
privacidad.section_9.title: 9. Minors
privacidad.title: Privacy Policy

proyecto_educativo.collaborative_work_de: Building solid bridges between home and institution for the child's success
proyecto_educativo.continuous_evaluation: Constant progress monitoring through systematic observations and appropriate evaluation tools.
proyecto_educativo.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the video capsule?
proyecto_educativo.description: Our educational project is based on the integral development of each child, respecting their times and enhancing their unique capacities through a personalized and multidisciplinary approach.
proyecto_educativo.document_content_titl: What will you find in this document?
proyecto_educativo.early_stimulation_des: Activities designed to enhance cognitive, motor and linguistic development through play and exploration.
proyecto_educativo.edit_video_capsule_de: Edit the information of the selected video capsule
proyecto_educativo.enhance_capabilities_: Identifying and fostering the individual strengths of each child
proyecto_educativo.individual_attention_: Personalized plans adapted to the specific needs of each child, with continuous monitoring.
proyecto_educativo.integral_development_: Working cognitive, emotional, social and physical aspects harmoniously
proyecto_educativo.methodology_subtitle: Activities designed to enhance comprehensive development
proyecto_educativo.objective_1: Development of oral language and effective communication
proyecto_educativo.objective_3: Promotion of creativity and artistic expression
proyecto_educativo.objective_4: Development of social and emotional skills
proyecto_educativo.objectives_subtitle: Clear and measurable goals for integral development
proyecto_educativo.philosophy_descriptio: At Plataforma Astral we firmly believe that each child is unique, with their own development rhythm and special potentialities. Our work focuses on:
proyecto_educativo.philosophy_subtitle: The pillars that support our educational vision
proyecto_educativo.respect_development_d: Recognizing that each little one advances at their own pace without pressure or comparisons
proyecto_educativo.specific_objective_1: Identify and work on specific difficulty areas
proyecto_educativo.team_meetings: Our team meets weekly to review cases and adjust strategies, ensuring a comprehensive and coordinated approach for each child.
proyecto_educativo.team_occupational_des: Specialist in fine motor development, coordination and daily living skills
proyecto_educativo.team_parvularia_desc: Educators with specialized training in child development and active methodologies
proyecto_educativo.team_psychologist_des: Professional who works on emotional development, social and school adaptation
proyecto_educativo.team_subtitle: Specialized professionals working together for integral development
proyecto_educativo.team_therapist_desc: Specialist in oral language stimulation, comprehension and verbal expression
proyecto_educativo.title: Educational Project
